column4: if I run xming (a windows x client), and don't forward it through ssh, then on my ssh connect type gedit
that should pull up gedit on my windows PC, but not forward the traffic through the tunnel??
can someone help me with xwindows
you can set up xdmcp,  I belive.
then just type sudo wireshark, that's it
i use xming all the time to get apps running on my windows box, from the linxu server in the basement
wI need to install xdmcp for this to work?
vsay: i just installed wireshark today, and ran it, worked well, but I use it through vnc
i alawya ENABLE xdmcp. its a feature of X. that way i can get a whole 'desktop' -  i dont thionk it needs to be enabled for just single apps.
xdmcp is there. just disabled.  by default.
vnc is handy also. for doing what i do,
but ive had some issues with vnc lately.
dr_willis: i type gedit, and it says "cant open display" in xming, i said no full screen, muliltple windows
I get this : fatal error InitOutput - Duplicate invocation on display number: 0.  Exiting.

you either need to export the display variable, or set up xhost +whatever properly.  thats what 'ssh' does for you automaticially. you might need ot be sure that your ssh stuff is set to X forwarding.
